channel.title: xmonad on QWxlea
channel.description: Recent content in xmonad on QWxlea

item.title: Quickly accessing WhatsApp on Xmonad
item.description: The whole point of using a tiling window manager is distractionless working. Unfortunetely the rest of the world does not always agree. Enter WhatsApp. WhatsApp is easy to use, and (in my part of the world) very popular. For a long time I used it from my phone, but that is not really convenient. Copying and pasting obviously is problematic, but the whole taking up your phone completely ruins any semblamce of workflow.
